name: Dill Pickle Appetizers
author: Crystal
summary: This is a very easy, delicious appetizer. A creamy mixture flavored with onion is spread on white bread and rolled with a crisp baby dill pickle. I usually at least triple the recipe for parties, because it disappears quickly.
ingredients: 1 (1 pound) loaf white bread, crusts trimmed
directions: In a medium bowl, mix cream cheese, mayonnaise, onion juice and grated onion
Spread the mixture thinly on the white bread slices
Roll 1 baby dill pickle in each slice of bread
Place in a medium glass baking dish with the seam side down
Cover and chill in the refrigerator 8 hours, or overnight
To serve, slice each bread roll into 1 inch slices
